title: Arrow 4x19 The Green Arrow meets the black canary imposter
author: ONCEUPON a HORRORSTORY
comment: Madison McLaughlin, who appeared as Evelyn Sharp, is returning for Arrow season 5 in the expanded role of Artemis.

Evelyn was last seen on Arrow season 4 during the episode “Canary Cry,” in which she impersonated Black Canary in order to exact revenge on Damien and Ruvé Darhk for killing her parents. She’ll return as Artemis beginning in episode two of the fifth season for multiple episodes as she attempts to form her own identity.
Madison McLaughlin, who appeared as Evelyn Sharp, is returning for Arrow season 5 in the expanded role of Artemis.

Madison McLaughlin, who appeared as Evelyn Sharp, is returning for Arrow season 5 in the expanded role of Artemis.

artemis-arrow-dc-comics

Madison McLaughlin, who appeared as Evelyn Sharp, is returning for Arrow season 5 in the expanded role of Artemis. The DC character played a large role in the animated series Young Justice, and was introduced as Green Arrow’s niece, though that was just a cover to hide her familial relationships from the team. (Her father in the show was Sportsmaster, her sister was Cheshire, and her mother was Huntress, all either current or former villains.) Artemis had a more nefarious turn in the comics as the daughter of Tigress and Sportsmaster who became a member of the Injustice Society.
